import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

def change_layers_first_letter_to_uppercase():
    # Get all the layers in the document
    layers = rs.LayerNames()

    if layers:
        for layer in layers:
            # Split the layer name by "::" to handle nested layers
            layer_parts = layer.split("::")
            
            # Capitalize the first letter of the last part of the layer name
            new_name = layer_parts[-1].capitalize()
            
            # Rename the layer with the updated name
            rs.RenameLayer(layer, new_name)

# Run the function
change_layers_first_letter_to_uppercase()
